category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_CriticalPath_Color
preference.preference_description: Sets the color for display of critical path. Valid Values: A user can set any value to this preference. The value specified must be a valid comma-separated integer code specified using three 8-bit unsigned integers (0 through 255) representing the intensities of red, green, and blue.
